description:
Alain`s Chesnaught was the first Pok√©mon to face Leon in the Masters Eight Tournament.
Leon`s Rillaboom faced off against Alain`s Chesnaught as the first match-up. It Gigantamax`d right off the start of the match which set the tone for the battle. Despite landing a few blows, Alain`s Chesnaught was over-matched as was defeated.
name: Brigarron (Alan)
